poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
There's no biz like po biz,
Bins of sludge and bings of
Methane-haunted solid waste
As evening brings the craws hame
The system brims: brigs
Are up to their tantalizing bilges,
Judges need their bibs.
Preening with rigid bills on calls to tender
The winner builds his jails before he bids.
